item.description: This is a great restaurant with terrific seafood. I know with office parties, etc. Dec. is a tough month for all of us to get togther. But, I would love to meet you all, have a lot a fun and, of course, enjoy a great dinner. Please RSVP as soon as possible due to the holiday rush! Looking forward to meeting you all and having a great dinner and a fun time. Judy [url=East of the River Dining Roup]Great Dinners and Friendships[/url]

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: East of the River Dining Out Group, fun, new friendships
